name: Kundan Kishore
description: The Complete Course on Indian Stock Market curated by Kundan Kishore.   A three month online course for investors, traders, students and career seekers.   90 recorded lectures covering fundamental analysis, portfolio management, option writing strategy, technical analysis and famous case studies.   Learn from the expert: Kundan Kishore with 15+ years of experience in the Indian Stock market. Ex - Morgan Stanley, Barclays Capital, and RBS. BITS Pilani alumnus.   Learn at your own pace: Online recorded lectures offer the flexibility of self-paced learning to users.   Learn anywhere: Hassle-free learning at the comfort of your home and office  no need to attend physical classes.  Interactive doubt clearing sessions: Attend live doubt clearing sessions and live chats to get your doubts cleared.   Learn affordably: For 990/- you get one-year unlimited access to all 90 video lectures.   Website: www.kundankishore.in Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/kishorekundan/ Quora: https://www.quora.com/profile/Kundan-Kishore-47 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kundan1kishore/ WhatsApp number: +91 95997 26400
